attributes.action: Mandatory self defence lessons for children school, subsidised for adults.
attributes.additional_details: I feel that women and girls or people coming to terms with gender issues, or gay men (the list is long, I am sure) are sometimes in situations where they feel they may have to defend themselves but don't know how, it will give confidence and is a skill I wish I had.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to do something positive to empower young people and women especially, so that would feel more confident in intimidating circumstances.

rejection.details:
We currently have two petitions open on the same topics, which you may like to  sign:

Add Self Defence to the National Curriculum from Year 7 upwards
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597552

Fund free self-defence classes for women in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578919
